name: Nite Moves
description:
Somewhere in the city sits an abandoned mall. Nobody knows when it was built or when it was abandoned. Over the years it has attracted the attention of many a teenager, and tonight is no different. You and your friends (Dropouts, Freaks, Geeks, Jocks, and Preps) have heard rumours of something living deep inside the mall, and tonight you're going to find out what it is, once and for all. Good luck.

Nite Moves is a roleplaying game set in a supernatural mall, and can be played with 2+ players and at least 6 six-sided dice. 

__________________________________________________________

This game originated from a discussion with a friend about what I could use Haruomi Hosono's album Watering A Flower for, and that album is most definitely the suggested soundtrack if you can access it!
